name: Operation: Wonderland
description:
Controls:
Movement: WASD
Attack: Left-Click
Rotate/Disable Wall: Right-Click
Use Jackhammer: C
Interact: E
Select Structure: Click, 1-6 keys, or mouse scroll

Operation: Wonderland is a fusion between tower defense and survival. The player must gather resources to build defenses so that they can survive. Waves of enemies will be attracted to the player’s activities, creating exciting combat to break up the slower paced resource management. The player can fight the enemies directly or rely on defenses they set up, although defenses can be damaged and must be maintained.
